title: Ghost of a Tale (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT
- Run "setup_ghost_of_a_tale_2.0.0.4.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: GHOST OF A TALE
Genre: Action - Role-playing - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Features: single-player - controller support - in development
Size: 0.9 GB
Company: SeithCG / SeithCG
Rating:	ESRB Rating: Everyone 10+
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/ghost_of_a_tale

About:
Ghost of a Tale is an action-RPG game in which you play as Tilo, a mouse and minstrel thrown in a perilous adventure. The game takes place in a medieval world populated only by animals and puts an emphasis on immersion and exploration. It features stealth elements, dialogs and quests.
Explore a medieval world as a minstrel mouse
Use your intelligence, nimbleness and stealth to survive
A non-violent game were you're not required to kill anyone

Minimum system requirements - Windows: 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: Intel i7 - 3.4Ghz
Memory: 4GB
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (3GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290
DirectX 11
Disk space: 5GB
Mouse, Keyboard 
A gamepad is highly recommended
